meanings.definition: Waterfloods: floods caused by an overflow of water.
meanings.sent1: During the heavy rain, the waterfloods covered the streets.
meanings.sent2: The town faced severe damage due to the waterfloods.
meanings.sent3: The waterfloods turned the park into a giant swimming pool!
meanings.sent4: Her tears were like waterfloods, flowing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The waterfloods rushed through the valley, carrying everything in their path.

meanings.sent1: The storm will waterfloods the basement if we don't fix the leak.
meanings.sent2: The dam was opened to waterfloods the dry fields.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally waterfloods the bathroom while trying to fix the faucet!
meanings.sent4: His emotions waterfloods his heart whenever he sees her.
meanings.sent5: The heavy rain continued to waterfloods the city streets, causing chaos.
